english.segment1: Enter on the narrow path. That this world has covered with obstruction. For the path is wide and the road well worn. Leading on towards destruction.
english.segment2: No strength to turn and fight. Or even the will to commit. The lane is now open wide. And many enter it.
english.segment3: The gate is small, the road is narrow. That will leave this world behind. A trail leading on to life. That only a few will find.
english.segment4: No strength to turn and fight. Or even the will to commit. The lane is now open wide. And many enter it.
